Desc.entry: Provides a service for people with mental health needs who need one-to-one support, are socially isolated, would like to take part in group activities or attend therapeutic groups and who need support with finance, budgeting and independent living skills. Rethink can allocate a mental health recovery worker, offer telephone support and an individual support plan, tailor-made to individuals' needs. Prices range from £12.50 for an individual session to £75 for a weekly support package. Charges are supplied by Rethink, please check them yourself for accuracy.
